mapper.select: SELECT CHAT_MSG_SQ, CHAT_MSG_CONT, SEND_DT, CK_SENDER_TYPE, SENDER_EMAIL, CHAT_ROOM_NO FROM CHAT_MESSAGE_TB WHERE CHAT_ROOM_NO = #{chatRoomSq} ORDER BY CHAT_MSG_SQ ASC
SELECT CHAT_MSG_SQ, CHAT_MSG_CONT, SEND_DT, CK_SENDER_TYPE, SENDER_EMAIL, CHAT_ROOM_NO FROM CHAT_MESSAGE_TB WHERE SENDER_EMAIL = #{senderEmail}
SELECT ADMIN_SQ, ADMIN_EMAIL_ID, ADMIN_PWD, ADMIN_REG_DT, INQ_CTG_CD, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CHAT_ROOM_TB WHERE CK_CHAT_ST = 'ACTIVE' ) AS ROOM_COUNT FROM ADMIN_TB WHERE INQ_CTG_CD = #{inqCtgCd}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CHAT_ROOM_TB WHERE ADMIN_NO = #{adminNo} AND CK_CHAT_ST = 'ACTIVE'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CHAT_ROOM_TB ( CHAT_ROOM_SQ, MEM_NO, USER_EMAIL, ADMIN_NO, INQ_CTG_CD ) VALUES ( CHAT_ROOM_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{memNo}, #{userEmail}, 1, #{inqCtgCd} )

INSERT INTO CHAT_MESSAGE_TB ( CHAT_MSG_SQ, CHAT_MSG_CONT, SEND_DT, CK_SENDER_TYPE, SENDER_EMAIL, CHAT_ROOM_NO ) VALUES ( CHAT_MSG_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{chatMsgCont}, SYSDATE, #{ckSenderType}, #{senderEmail}, #{chatRoomNo} )
